definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
lit. to invert black and white (idiom); to distort the truth deliberately/to misrepresent the facts/to invert right and wrong
can't tell black from white (idiom); unable to distinguish wrong from right
to confuse black and white/to say that black is white/fig. not to distinguish right from wrong
(Tw) heibaiqie, side dish of ingredients selected from a range on display, sliced up and served together on a plate (from Taiwanese 烏白切, Tai-lo pr. [oo-pe̍h-tshiat], where 烏白 means "as one pleases")
(bird species of China) Jerdon's bush chat (Saxicola jerdoni)
Two deities, one short, one tall, chained together at the ankle, responsible for rewarding the good and punishing the bad

sentences.english: Captured with black and white film, her photography emulates the style of a cinematographer.
sentences.chinese: 黑白膠片同時也模擬着舞臺人生。

sentences.english: It seems that you love doing black & white photography, Please explain why.
sentences.chinese: 看來你鍾情於從事黑白攝影，請交代何解。

sentences.english: The name for this border between lunar night and day is the terminator line.
sentences.chinese: 我們把月亮上的黑白邊界線叫做‘晨昏線’。

sentences.english: He has white and black fur, without hair.
I loved old black and white movies.
Our initial studies were done with simple sketched icons in black-and-white ink on paper.
sentences.chinese: 我們使用畫在紙上的簡單黑白草圖進行最初的研究。

sentences.english: Black and white red trichromatic advocate hit my home.
Black and white world of thinking into the marsh mud lake.
sentences.chinese: 黑白的世界把思想推入沼澤泥塘。

sentences.english: Compared with black and white television, color TV is much more complex.
sentences.chinese: 與黑白電視相比，彩色電視機要複雜得多。

sentences.english: The chequered background is a little distracting .
sentences.chinese: 黑白格子的背景是一個小分心。

sentences.english: Bain's device transmitted strictly black and white images.
sentences.chinese: 貝因的記錄電報機傳送嚴格意義上的黑白圖像。

sentences.english: Slightly larger units can run radios and black-and-white television sets.
sentences.chinese: 稍許大一點的裝置能帶收音機和黑白電視機。

sentences.english: The initial image released Saturday was in black and white.
sentences.chinese: 上週六最初公佈的圖片是黑白照片。

sentences.english: Eg: What caused the confusion between black and white?
The one on the far right, with long, black-and-white hair, is Buddie .
sentences.chinese: 最右邊有着長長的黑白相間的毛的那只是布迪。

sentences.english: S. comic book market for a black-and-white comic book.
sentences.chinese: 漫畫書市場還在賣這一黑白漫畫書。

definition: Deep Blue, chess-playing computer, first to defeat reigning world champion, developed by IBM (1985-1997)
